author: luehe
msg: Do not let the parsing error of a single TLD disrupt the parsing of remaining TLDs in the JAR

author: luehe
msg: Avoid TLD-scanning the JARs under WEB-INF lib twice per webapp.
When navigating the webapp classloader delegation chain in search for
"global" JARs, we are also adding the JARs under WEB-INF lib,
which has become redundant and has been removed.

author: remm
msg: - Save the config file to the config base in situations where the context
would not be persistent after a restart.
- I don't think I broke anything. Let me know ...
